price: duke i pëshpëritur njëri-tjetrit: “Ju keni qëndruar (në dynja) vetëm dhjetë ditë.”
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
